Bacteria, Viruses, Fungi and Parasites - Kills bacteria. ( 331 )

Bacteria, Viruses, Fungi and Parasites - An agent that inhibits or destroys a living organism. It usually refers to bacteria or other micro-organisms and is probably synonymous with Antibacterial ( 34 )

Bowels and Bladder - A purgative that causes an abundant watery discharge. ( 8 )

Bowels and Bladder - Treats urinary problems, including urinary tract infection (UTI). ( 228 )

Cancer - Used in the treatment of cancer. ( 366 )
Cancer - Slows or controls the growth of tumours. ( 19 )

Cancer - Breaks down tumors. This might be placed under antitumor. ( 48 )
Chest and Lungs - Treats asthma. ( 153 )
Chest and Lungs - Prevents or relieves coughing. ( 230 )
Chest and Lungs - Removes phlegm and mucous, especially from the respiratory system. ( 13 )

Chest and Lungs - Clears phlegm from the chest by inducing coughing. ( 486 )
Chest and Lungs - Relieves respiratory diseases, a remedy for chest diseases. ( 192 )

Ear, Nose and Throat and Eyes - Promotes sneezing and nasal discharges. ( 21 )

Fevers - Reduces fevers. ( 821 )

General Well Being - A healing and soothing agent. ( 16 )
General Well Being - A food for convalescents to help restore strength. ( 40 )
General Well Being - Improves general health. Slower acting than a stimulant, it brings steady improvement. ( 838 )
Heart and Blood - Prevents the build up of cholesterol. ( 50 )
Heart and Blood - Removes blood clots. ( 24 )
Heart and Blood - Purifies the blood. ( 60 )
Heart and Blood - Is this any different to a blood purifier? ( 42 )
Heart and Blood - Used in the treatment of heart problems. ( 137 )
Heart and Blood - A tonic for the heart. ( 151 )
Heart and Blood - Breaks down red blood corpuscles to separate haemoglobin. ( 12 )
Heart and Blood - Reduces the levels of sugar in the blood. ( 119 )
Heart and Blood - Reduces blood pressure, it is used in the treatment of high blood pressure ( 207 )
Heart and Blood - Narrows the blood vessels, thereby increasing blood pressure. ( 25 )
Heart and Blood - Widens the blood vessels, thereby reducing blood pressure. ( 84 )
Infectious Diseases - Counteracts recurring illnesses such as malaria. ( 83 )
Infectious Diseases - Counteracts scrofula. (TB, especially of the lymph glands) ( 16 )
Infectious Diseases - Plants used in the treatment of tuberculosis ( 66 )
Infectious Diseases - Used in the treatment of venereal disease ( 93 )

Infectious Diseases - Treats malaria - an acute febrile illness caused by Plasmodium parasites spread to people through the bites of mosquitos. ( 152 )
Infectious Diseases - Used to treat leprosy - a chronic bacterial infection of the skin and superficial nerves (in the skin) caused by Mycobacterium leprae. ( 84 )
Infectious Diseases - Used in treating dysentery - an infection of the intestines that causes diarrhoea containing blood or mucus. ( 583 )
